about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Reetech International Cargo and Courier Ltd is a Coal Supplier in India. The company's diversified product portfolio comprises coal from Indonesia, South Africa, Australia and India, among other origins.

The company supply the products to customers in various sectors i.e., Power, Steel, Rolling and other industries. An effective handling and transportation of the orders is facilitated through Road transportation and Railway.

Initially the Company was engaged in the business of agriculture goods such as Rice Milling, Rice Sorting, Dal Milling, Dal Processing and Agriculture Products.

Competitive Strength :

  • Experience and Track Record.
  • Experienced Promoters and Management.
  • Repeat Business.
  • Location Advantage.
  • Satisfied Chain of Vendors.
  • Progressive Employer.

faqs.question: What is the Reetech International Cargo IPO?
faqs.answer:
Reetech International Cargo IPO is a SME IPO of 1114800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹105 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 27, 2022, and closes on September 29, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Reetech International Cargo IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Reetech International Cargo IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Reetech International Cargo IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Reetech International Cargo IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Reetech International Cargo IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Reetech International Cargo IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Reetech International Cargo IPO opens on September 27, 2022 and closes on September 29, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Reetech International Cargo IPO?
faqs.answer: Reetech International Cargo IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Reetech International Cargo IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Reetech International Cargo IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Reetech International Cargo IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Reetech International Cargo IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 4, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, October 7, 2022. Check the Reetech International Cargo IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Reetech International Cargo IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Reetech International Cargo IPO listing date is on Monday, October 10, 2022.
